timeline.bodyText:
nit:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                LOG.info("Clearing the metrics store and metrics system in {} ms",
          
          
            
                LOG.info("Cleared the metrics store and metrics system in {} ms",
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: what does memoizing do for us here?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: So that when MetricsSystem record the metrics of any UFS operation,  the escaped path can be memorized without constructing Alluxio URI and call metho in MetricsSystem.
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: Isn't the escaped path always the same though because mPath is final?
replies.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: Make sense, Changed to initialize directly in the constructor.
replies.author: LuQQiu

timeline.bodyText: I feel like this will be a spammy log at INFO level
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: ResetAllMetrics() is used very often in tests, but should be called really rarely in production. It will only be called when the Master starts and when the fsadmin metrics clear is called. Since it may affect the metrics recording and delays some metrics heartbeat, logging is useful.
replies.author: LuQQiu

timeline.bodyText: If you're looking to escape into URI-compatible paths I would look somewhere in apache commons utils
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: I haven't found existing utils doing exactly the same thing. If there is a util method, that would be really convenient.
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText:
I don't know what the original intention of this code was (if it is doing a URL encoding on the metric name or not, but it looks like it to me.
We should be using this: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/net/URLEncoder.html
replies.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText:
I think for the first time MetricsSystem.escape created for Metric name processing. Like we use . for distinguish metric name components like (InstanceType.MetricName.Tag:TagValue), so the given url should not have ..
This use case does not fit in UTLEncoder because it will The special characters ".", "-", "*", and "_" remain the same.
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: Since the code was already here I guess it's ok - but this seems very sketchy to me...we should improve it in the future.
replies.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it's sketchy, will reconsider how to improve it in the future
replies.author: LuQQiu

timeline.message: Merge os master and solve conflicts
